page.title: 05OUR AREA
page.content: Our area includes parts of Ecclesfield,Chapeltown, and Burncross.Ecclesfield is a very old vilage the name means 'church in the field'.Ecclesfield has a large park and playgrounds, but hasn't got many shopping facilites.Chapeltown got its name because there was a small chapel of Ease as the people of Chapeltown could'nt always get to Ecclesfield church on sunday mornings.Chapeltown was a small mining village with a drift mine that is now closed. Burncross got its name because it used to be called"burnt cross ".People used to burn a cross at the cross roads to ward off evil spirts.Burncross Road used to be a pack horse track running along the same route as a small stream.
